name: Root Down
description:
Root Down is an original abstract strategy game designed for 2-players, and it should take no more than ten minutes to play. (15 if you are thinking really hard!)

In Root Down, you have two types of pieces. There are "kicker" pieces that must be next to a "root" piece to move. After a kicker moves, it turns into another root, "kicking" all of the neighboring pieces in the process. Kick an opponent's root, then kick it again to capture it!

Please use the "send feedback" button to send me your input, or email me: rootdown@abstractpuzzle.com

Thanks for reading, and thanks for supporting indie game development!
